content:
Quite a few people have pointed out to me that the fhir web site is having problems. http://hl7.org/fhir/ is not working.

The problem is nothing I can do anything about - it's something about the way IIS at hl7.org is set up (for web server weenies, it's the default file setup). http://hl7.org/fhir/index.html works normally
There are known connectivity issues with our fiber provider. Logins to hl7.org are affected.
We are working on restoring connectivity now.
Connectivity is restored. Power was removed at the telco switch. All failovers for hardware maintained connectivity.
My guess is a building maintenance switchover, and no one in the building to say no...
There are known connectivity issues at HL7 HQ. Logins are affected.
There is electrical failure in the area surrounding HQ
There are known issues with network connectivity concerning hl7.org. Please hold...
Website Network Issues were upstream. All is well. Please stop holding...

All, Fiber at HL7 Headquarters is down. A technician has been dispatched and I am in the office to meet them.

The LISTSERV is NOT accepting or sending mail.

WWW.HL7.ORG is working through a local userbase. User accounts added in the last two days will not be available.

I will send updates as I have them.
Our Fiber connection has been restored. The LISTSERV is AVAILABLE. Logins on www.hl7.org are restored. Thank you for your patience!
